content:
How do you get simplifier to resolve to the latest definition of a resource.

For example this url no longer goes direct to the latest version of the resource.

https://simplifier.net/resolve?target=simplifier&scope=uk.nhsdigital.r4&canonical=https://fhir.nhs.uk/Id/nhs-number

Now it goes to a page which lists one correct match according the to specified scope and a number of wrong matches which don't match the scope.
@Ward Weistra ^^ This appears to have changed today
@Kevin Mayfield Thanks for the report, looking into it

@Kevin Mayfield There's an issue currently with resolving to the latest version of a package, will likely be resolved later this week. Until then a versioned resolve does work: https://simplifier.net/resolve?scope=uk.nhsdigital.r4@2.4.3&canonical=https://fhir.nhs.uk/Id/nhs-number
Hi @Kevin Mayfield, this should be resolved now, can you please test again?
Yes it is. Many thanks for the prompt response.
